task.title: Opening rear windows
task.shortdesc: The rear windows slide open to allow fresh air to circulate while driving.

context.p:
The glasses in the rear windows operate in sliding channels.When locking the vehicle make sure that the window tabs are in the locked position. Rear windows
The rear windows

step.cmd: To open the windows, fold the hinged locking tab inwards clear of the stop plate.
Use the hand-pull on the forward edge of the glass to pull the window to the required position.
